GSP29antsdi_u:7105_2: kriyāvattvāt ityapi sādhyatām aviśeṣāt iti pratyavasthānaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7108: prakāśikā aprāptisamālakṣaṇam aprāptyā pratyavasthānam aprāptisamā/ yathā tatraiva pūrvoktadoṣādaprāptasya
GSP29antsdi_u:7109: hetoḥ sādhyasādhakatvaṃ vācyam, tathā cāprāptatvāviśeṣāt sarvaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7110: sarvaṃ sādhayet iti/ ayameva hetuḥ sādhyābhāvaṃ kimiti na sādhayet/ sādhyameva tu sādhayedityatra vinigamakābhāvāt iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:7112_0: aprāptyā pratyavasthānamiti / aprāptiḥ sādhyahetvoḥ asāmānādhikaraṇyam / atraivaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7112_1: vikalpaḥ kartavyaḥ / ātmā kriyāvān kriyāhetuguṇavattvāt ityukte ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhyasamānādhikaraṇaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7112_2: san sādhyaṃ sādhayati vā? sādhyāsamānādhikaraṇaḥ san sādhyaṃ sādhayati
GSP29antsdi_u:7113: vā? ādye sāmānādhikaraṇyāviśeṣāt sādhyenāpi kuto na hetuḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7114_0: sādhyata iti pratyavasthānāt prāptisamā / dvitīye asāmānādhikaraṇyāviśeṣāt sādhyamiva
GSP29antsdi_u:7114_1: anyat sarvaṃmapi hetuḥ kuto na sādhayet / tathā ca sarvaḥ sarvaṃ sādhayet / tathā
GSP29antsdi_u:7118_0: prakāśikā prasaṅgasamālakṣaṇam sādhanaparamparāpraśnaḥ prasaṅgasamā / yathā kriyāvattve
GSP29antsdi_u:7118_1: kriyāhetuguṇavattvaṃ sādhanam / tatra kiṃ sādhanam? na hi sādhanaṃ vinā kasyacit
GSP29antsdi_u:7119: bālapriyā prasaṅgasamāṃ lakṣayati - sādhanaparamparāpraśna iti/ sādhanaparamparā viṣayakaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7120: prasaṅgasamā/”sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyamiti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ”iti bhāṣyam/ śiṣṭaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7122_1: yathā 'tatraiva loṣṭadṛṣṭāntena kriyāvattve sādhite niṣkriyākāśadṛṣṭāntena ātmano
GSP29antsdi_u:7123: kiṃ na syāt/ loṣṭadṛṣṭāntena kriyāvattvaṃ ākāśadṛṣṭāntena
GSP29antsdi_u:7126: bālapriyā pratidṛṣṭāntasamāmāha - dṛṣṭāntāntareṇeti/ ātmā kriyāvān kriyāhetuguṇayuktatvāt loṣṭavat iti loṣṭadṛṣṭāntena kriyāvattvaṃ sādhyate cet ātmā niṣkriyaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7127_0: kriyāhetuvāyusaṃyogavattvāt ākāśavat ityākāśadṛṣṭāntena kuto na sādhayituṃ śakyata
GSP29antsdi_u:7127_1: iti prakṛtasādhyaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ pradarśya dūṣaṇodbhāvanaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamā /”kriyāvān
GSP29antsdi_u:7127_2: ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogāt loṣṭavat ityukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate
GSP29antsdi_u:7128: kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ dṛṣṭathmati/ kaḥ punarākāśasyaṃ kriyāhetuguṇaḥ, vāyunā saṃyogaḥ”iti bhāṣyam/
GSP29antsdi_u:7129: prakāśikā anutpattisamālakṣaṇam anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamā/ yathā 'ghaṭo na nityaḥ janyaikātvāt'
GSP29antsdi_u:7130: ityādau kaścidāha - yadi janyaikatvaṃ anityatve pramāṇam tadā ghaṭe
GSP29antsdi_u:7131: ekatvotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ tadabhāvāt nityatvam/ nityaścet tarhi anutpanna
GSP29antsdi_u:7134: anutpattyā pratyavasthānamiti/ janyaikatvāditi/ janyaṃ ca tat ekatvaṃ ca janyaikatvam, tasmāt/ anutpanna eveti/ tathā ca anityatvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7135: bādhitāmiti bhāvaḥ/”tathā ca sādhanāṅgapakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāṃ utpatteḥ prāk hetvabhāva ityanutpattyā pratyavasthānaṃ anutpattisamaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:7138: prakāśikā saṃśayasamālakṣaṇam sādhāraṇadharmaṃ pradarśyaṃ saṃśayodbhāvanaṃ saṃśayasamā/ yathā 'śabdo 'nityaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7140: sādharmyaṃ yathā asti tathā nityena śabdatvena saha śrāvaṇapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ sādharmyaṃ astīti ubhayasādharmyadarśanāt saṃśayaḥ syāt/ ekapariśeṣe
GSP29antsdi_u:7144: saṃśayakāraṇopalakṣaṇam/ tena samānadharmadarśanādi yatkiñcitsaṃśayakāraṇabalāt saṃśayena pratyavasthānaṃ saṃśayasamaḥ”iti
GSP29antsdi_u:7148: bālapriyā prakaraṇasamāmāha vādyaktahetoriti/ śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavat iti vādinā
GSP29antsdi_u:7149_0: anityatvasādhanāya kṛtakatvahetau ukte sati tādṛśahetusādhyasya anityatvasya viparītaṃ

GSP29antsdi_u:7153: tadānityatvarūpasādhyasya tadānīmabhāvāt kasya sādhakam/ atha paścātkālavṛtti cet tadā pūrvakāle sādhanābhāvāt kasya
GSP29antsdi_u:7154: sādhyamanityatvam/ yadi ca ubhayaṃ ekakālavṛtti tadā kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam/ vinigamakābhāvāditi/ hetusameti pāṭhe tu
GSP29antsdi_u:7156: bālapriyā ahetusamāṃ lakṣayati - kālatraye 'pīti/ kālatraye 'pi hetutvāsambhavakathanapūrvakaṃ ahetutvakathanam ahetusamā/
GSP29antsdi_u:7158: anityatvasya kāryatvaṃ na sādhakamityarthaḥ/ pūrvakālāvacchedena avidyamānasya sādhyasya hetuḥ kathaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7159: sādhako bhavet iti bhāvaḥ/ kasya sādhyamanityatvamiti/ anityatvaṃ kāryatvasya sādhyaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7160: na bhavatītyarthaḥ/ kālatrayaśabdena kāryakālatatpūrvakālatatpaścātkālāḥ vivakṣitāḥ/”heturahetunā na viśiṣṭayate/ ahetunā sādharmyāt pratyavasthānam ahetusamaḥ”iti bhāṣyam/
GSP29antsdi_u:7162: yathā”pūrvoktānumāne śabdasya anityasādharmyādanityatvaṃ yadi, tadā arthāpattyā siddhaṃ nityasādharmyāt nityatvamapi ekatarāvadhāraṇe
GSP29antsdi_u:7164_0: bālapriyā arthāpattisamāṃ lakṣayati - arthāpattipuraskāreṇeti / śabdaḥ anityaḥ kṛtakatvāt
GSP29antsdi_u:7164_1: iti anityena ghaṭena kṛtakatvasādharmyāt śabdaḥ anityaḥ ityukte arthādāpadyate nityasādharmyāt
GSP29antsdi_u:7164_2: nitya iti / asti ca nityena ākāśena asparśatvarūpaṃ sādharmyaṃ śabdasya iti śabdo
GSP29antsdi_u:7164_3: nitya eva kiṃ na syādityevam arthāpattipūrvakaṃ dūṣaṇodbhāvanaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7165: arthāpattisametyarthaḥ/”arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ sādhayataḥ arthāpattisamaḥ/ yadi prāyatnānantarīyakatvāt
GSP29antsdi_u:7166: anityaḥ śabda iti, tadā arthādāpadyate nityasādharmyāt nitya iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:7167: asti tvasya nityena sādharmyaṃ asparśatvam”iti bhāṣyam/
GSP29antsdi_u:7170_0: prakāśikā aviśeṣasamālakṣaṇam sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgodbhāvanam aviśeṣasamā / yathā tatraiva
GSP29antsdi_u:7170_1: 'yadi kṛtakatvādinā anityaghaṭādisādharmyeṇa śabdasya anityatvaṃ tadā prameyatvādirūpeṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:7171: maduktasādharmyeṇa tatsidhyati, na tu tvaduktenetyatra niyāmakābhāvāt'
GSP29antsdi_u:7174: kṛtakatvāt ityatra ekasya dharmasyaś kṛtakatvādeḥ śabde ghaṭe ca sattvāt yadi śabdaghaṭayoranityatvenāviśeṣa ucyate, tadā
GSP29antsdi_u:7176: sarveṣu sattvāt/ tathā ca sanmātravṛttidharmeṇāviśeṣāpādanamaviśeṣasamā/ tathā ca sarveṣāmabhede
GSP29antsdi_u:7179_1: yathā 'yadi anityatvasādhanaṃ kāryatvamupapadyata iti śabdasyānityatvaṃ tadā nityatvasādhanamapi
GSP29antsdi_u:7180: kiñcidupapadyata iti nityatvaṃ kiṃ na syāt' iti/

GSP29antsdi_u:7182_1: iti dvayorapi pakṣayoḥ sādhanasyopapannatvākhyaṃ samānadharmaṃ puraskṛtya pratyavasthānam
GSP29antsdi_u:7183_1: upalabdhisamā / yathā śabdo 'nityaḥ prayatnānuvidhāyitvāt ghaṭavat ityatra prayatnaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7185_0: bālapriyā upalabdhisamāṃ sodāharaṇaṃ lakṣayati - vādyakteti / vādinā nirdiṣṭasya
GSP29antsdi_u:7185_1: kāraṇasyābhāve 'pi sādhyopalambhāt pratyavasthānam upalabdhisamaḥ / tathā hi - parvato
GSP29antsdi_u:7185_2: vahnimān dhūmāt ityādikaṃ vahnyavadhāraṇārthaṃ ucyate, na tatsambhavati, dhūmaṃ vinā
GSP29antsdi_u:7186: tathā ca na tasya sādhakatvamiti pratikūlatarkaḥ iti viśvanāthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:7187_0: prakāśikā anupalabdhisamālakṣaṇam vādinānupalabdhivaśāt kasyacit padārthasya anaṅgīkāre
GSP29antsdi_u:7187_2: yathā - 'jalādeḥ vidyamānasyāpi āvaraṇavaśāt yathānupalabdhiḥ tathā uccāraṇātpūrvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7187_3: śabdasya vidyamānasyāpi āvaraṇavaśāt anupalabdhiḥ ityetanmataṃ vādināṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7188_0: dūṣyate-yadyāvaraṇavaśāt śabdo nopalabhyete, tadā jalādyāvaraṇamiva śabdādyāvaraṇamapyupalabhyeteti /
GSP29antsdi_u:7188_1: atrottaram-yadi bhavadbhiḥ anupalabdhita āvaraṇaṃ nābhyupeyate tadā anupalabdherapi
GSP29antsdi_u:7191: bālapriyā anupalabdhisamāṃ lakṣayati - vādineti/ naiyāyikaistāvat śabdānityatvaṃ evaṃ sādhyate
GSP29antsdi_u:7192: - yadi śabdaḥ nityaḥ syāt tarhi uccāraṇāt prāk kuto nopalabhyate/ na hi ghaṭādyāvaraṇakuḍyādivat
GSP29antsdi_u:7193: tadanupalabdheriti/ tatraivaṃ jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate-yadyāvaraṇānupalabdheḥ āvaraṇābhāvaḥ sidhyati tadā
GSP29antsdi_u:7194_1: anupalabdhipramāṇakaḥ āvaraṇābhāvo na syāt api tu āvaraṇopapattireva syāditi śabdanityatve
GSP29antsdi_u:7195: itthaṃ ca evaṃrūpeṇa pratyavasthānam anupalabdhisametyartha iti
GSP29antsdi_u:7197: prakāśikā nityasamālakṣaṇam dharmasya nityatvānityatvavikalpāt dharmiṇo nityatvasādhanam nityasamā/
GSP29antsdi_u:7198: 'śabdasya yat anityatvaṃ bhavadbhiḥ ucyate tat nityaṃ anityaṃ vā/
GSP29antsdi_u:7199: yadi nityaṃ tadā śabdavṛttereva tasya sadātanatvāt śabdasyāpi
GSP29antsdi_u:7200: tathātvamāgatam/ atha anityaṃ tadā śabde kadācit anityatvābhāvo 'stīti nitya eva śabda ityubhayathāpi śabdasya nityatvam' iti/
GSP29antsdi_u:7202_0: - dharmasyeti / śabdasyāpi tathātvamāgatamiti / śabdasyāpi nityatvaṃ prasaktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29antsdi_u:7202_1: dharmiṇaṃ vinā dharmasya sthityabhāvena dharmasyānityatvasya nityatve sadātanatve
GSP29antsdi_u:7202_2: dharmī śabdo 'pi nityaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ / śabde anityatvasya nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ svīkāre
GSP29antsdi_u:7202_3: anitye śabde nityatvaṃ syādityāpādanaṃ nityasamā iti viśvanārthaḥ /
GSP29antsdi_u:7203_1: anityasamā / yathā 'yadi anityena ghaṭane sādṛśyāt śabdaḥ anityaḥ ityucyate tadā
GSP29antsdi_u:7205: bālapriyā anityasamāṃ lakṣayati - anityadṛṣṭānteti/ anityena ghaṭena sādharmyāt
GSP29antsdi_u:7206: (kṛtakatvarūpāt) anityaḥ śabda iti bruvataḥ asti ghaṭenānityena
GSP29antsdi_u:7207_0: sarvabhāvānāṃ sādharmyaṃ (sattvādirūpam) iti sarvasya anityatvamaniṣṭaṃ sampadyate /
GSP29antsdi_u:7207_1: so 'yaṃ anityatvena pratyavasthānāt anityasama iti bhāṣyam / vyāptimapuraskṛtya yatkiñciddṛṣṭāntasādharmyeṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:7209: anityasamā/ sādhyapadādaviśeṣasamāto vyavacchedaḥ tatra sarvāviśeṣa evāpadyate na tu sarvasya sādhyavattvam iti viśvanārthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:7210_0: prakāśikā kāryasamālakṣaṇam vādyuktahetoḥ anyakoryeṇāpi sambhavābhidhānaṃ kāryaṃsamā /
GSP29antsdi_u:7210_1: yathā tatraiva prayatnānuvidhāyitvaṃ ubhayathāpi sambhavati ghaṭādivat śabdasvarūpotpattau
GSP29antsdi_u:7214_0: prayatnānuvidhāyitvasya ubhayatra śabdasyotpattau tadāvarakanivṛttau ca samatvābhidhānam'
GSP29antsdi_u:7214_1: iti rītyā ukta evārthe paryavasānamavaseyam / atra granthagauravabhayāt sūkṣmaprakārāḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7217_0: - vādyuktahetoriti / yathā śabdaḥ anityaḥ prayatnānuvidhāyitvāt ityatra prayatnānuvidhāyitvaṃ
GSP29antsdi_u:7217_1: kāryadvaye 'sti svarūpotpattau āvarakanivṛttau ceti / tatra svarūpotpattyabhiprāyeṇa
GSP29antsdi_u:7218: jātivādala āha āvarakanivṛttāveva prayatnānuvidhāyitvasyopayogaḥ na svarūpotpattāviti śabdasyānityatvaṃ na sidhyatīti/ evaṃrītyā pratyavasthānaṃ kāryasametyarthaḥ/
GSP29antsdi_u:7219: atredamavadheyam-keṣucit grantheṣu sādharmyasamā vaidharmyasamā ityādirūpeṇa strīliṅgatayā
GSP29antsdi_u:7220: prayujyate, keṣucittu sādharmyasamaḥ vaidharmyasamaḥ ityādirūpeṇa pulliṅgatayā prayujyate/ tatra jāterviśeṣyatvavivakṣāyāṃ samaśabdasya
GSP29antsdi_u:7222: ityādirūpeṇa pulliṅgatayaiva nirdiśati/ tasyāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - vādyaktasya pratiṣedhaḥ kila jātivādinā kriyate, tatra pratiṣeghaśabdaḥ pulliṅga
GSP29antsdi_u:7223: iti tadanurodhena samaśabdasya pulliṅgeteti/ taduktaṃ nyāyapariśuddhau vedāntadeśikaiḥ -”akṣapādīyeṣu ca jātiviśeṣalakṣaṇasūtreṣu pulliṅgāntasamaśabdanirdeśaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7224: svapakṣasthāpanaparapakṣapratikṣeparūpeṇa vibhāge pratyavasthāne pratiṣedhabhāgenātra jātitvaṃ vivakṣitam ityuktarūpajātiviśeṣābhiprāya ityāhuḥ”iti/ nyāyabhāṣyakārādayo 'pīti
GSP29antsdi_u:7225: pratiṣedhaśabdasya sūtre bahulaṃ prayogāt pratiṣedhaśabdamādāyeva samaśabde pulliṅganirvāhaṃ manyante/ viśvanāthanyāyapañcānanastu
GSP29antsdi_u:7227: iti vadan vikalpaśabdānusāreṇa samaśabdasya pulliṅgatāṃ nirvahati/ evaṃ vādinā sādhane kriyāmāṇe tatra prativādinā
GSP29antsdi_u:7228: udbhāvyamānaḥ asaduttaraviśeṣaḥ jātiḥ/ tasya jātiśabdavācyatā jāyamānatvanibandhanā/ tathā
GSP29antsdi_u:7229: pratyavasthānam jātiḥ”iti/ kathāyāṃ pravṛttayoḥ vādiprativādinoḥ madhye vādinā sādhane kṛte yathāvasthitottarasphurtirahitasya jigīṣoḥ prativādinaḥ mukhāt yaḥ kaścit
GSP29antsdi_u:7230_0: hetvābhāsaḥ avaśāt āgataḥ jāyamāna eva bhavati na tu jātaḥ san kāryakaro 'pītyāśayena
GSP29antsdi_u:7230_1: avadhāraṇārthatayā jātiśabdaḥ pravartata iti uttamūruvīrarāghavācāryasvāminaḥ nirūpayanti /
GSP29antsdi_u:7232_0: vādiprativādiprayuktayorheṃtvoḥ(?) sāmyam, vādiprativādinorapi sāmyaṃ ca samaśabdena

GSP29antsdi_u:7236: - vādinā prativādinaḥ samīkaraṇam/ tathā ca prativādinā
GSP29antsdi_u:7237: svāpakarṣaparihārārthamantataḥ samīkaraṇārthaṃ jātiprayogaḥ kriyata ityuktaṃ bhavati/ deśikacaraṇāstu nyāyapariśuddhau jātiprayogaḥ
GSP29antsdi_u:7238: kriyata ityuktaṃ bhavati/ deśikacaraṇāstu nyāyapariśuddhau jātivādiprayuktahetoḥ paraghātakatvavat
GSP29antsdi_u:7239: tadeva sāmyaṃ samaśabdena pratipādyata iti nirvahanti/

GSP29antsdi_u:7242: tadetanmanasi nidhāyāha - atra granthagauravabhayāt sūkṣmaprakārāḥ na darśitāḥ iti/ kiṃ ca āsāṃ
